page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KATE -2
page.content: tennis games or play a little game of our own till the bell rings, when we go back to class and carry on with what we are doing till dinner. At 12.00 to 1.00pm we go out to{play maybe a few{games}on the field then perhaps when we go back to class we get changed and go into the hall for P.E. or music for half an hour. At the end of the afternoon we do a great clear up then go{home.}When I go home I go to piano lessons at 4.30pm and stay there for half an hour. Then I go home, have a{bath}then go to{bed}at about 9.30pm.
